metadata.title: CVE-2022-32740 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A reply to a forwarded email article by a 3rd party could unintensionallyexpose the email content to the ticket customer under certaincircumstances.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
